info.title: ElevenLabs API Documentation
info.description:
This is the documentation for the ElevenLabs API. You can use this API to use our service programmatically, this is done by using your xi-api-key.
You can view your xi-api-key using the 'Profile' tab on https://beta.elevenlabs.io. Our API is experimental so all endpoints are subject to change.

get.description: Returns metadata about all your generated audio.

parameters.description: Your API key. This is required by most endpoints to access our API programatically. You can view your xi-api-key using the 'Profile' tab on the website.

schema.title: Xi-Api-Key
schema.description: Your API key. This is required by most endpoints to access our API programatically. You can view your xi-api-key using the 'Profile' tab on the website.

parameters.name: xi-api-key

get.description: Returns the audio of an history item.

parameters.description: History item ID to be used, you can use GET https://api.elevenlabs.io/v1/history to receive a list of history items and their IDs.

schema.description: History item ID to be used, you can use GET https://api.elevenlabs.io/v1/history to receive a list of history items and their IDs.

post.description: Download one or more history items. If one history item ID is provided, we will return a single audio file. If more than one history item IDs are provided, we will provide the history items packed into a .zip file.

post.description: This function will be called on an interval by a cloud function. Only 1 function can be running at a time due to GlobalLock.
This function will be called on an interval by a cloud function.
Add a trial to an account.
Manually verify the email of an account.
Add a trial to an account.
Create a payment Link for an account on free tier.
Manually start fine-tuning for the given voice

name.title: Name
name.description: The name that identifies this voice. This will be displayed in the dropdown of the website.

files.title: Files
files.description: Sufficient amount of audio files to fine tune the voice from

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Serialized labels dictionary for the voice.

voice_limit.title: Voice Limit
voice_limit.description: The new voice limit of the user

character_limit.title: Character Limit
character_limit.description: The new character_count of the user

trial_duration_days.title: Trial Duration Days
trial_duration_days.description: How long the trial will last in days

company_name.title: Company Name
company_name.description: The name of the enterprise client.

voice_limit.title: Voice Limit
voice_limit.description: The new voice limit of the user

character_limit.title: Character Limit
character_limit.description: The new character_count of the user

cents_per_month_base_tier.title: Cents Per Month Base Tier
cents_per_month_base_tier.description: Price in cents the customer has to pay for the base tier on a recurring basis

cents_per_thousand_characters.title: Cents Per Thousand Characters
cents_per_thousand_characters.description: How many cents the client should pay for every 1000 characters above his character limit.

billing_threshold_cents.title: Billing Threshold Cents
billing_threshold_cents.description: At which repeating threshold in cents a new invoice will be send to the customer.

history_item_ids.title: History Item Ids
history_item_ids.description: A list of history items to remove, you can get IDs of history items and other metadata using the GET https://api.elevenlabs.io/v1/history endpoint.

history_item_ids.title: History Item Ids
history_item_ids.description: A list of history items to download, you can get IDs of history items and other metadata using the GET https://api.elevenlabs.io/v1/history endpoint.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name that identifies this voice. This will be displayed in the dropdown of the website.

files.title: Files
files.description: Audio files to add to the voice

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Serialized labels dictionary for the voice.

text.title: Text
text.description: The text that will get converted into speech. Currently only English text is supported.

voice_settings.title: Voice Settings
voice_settings.description: Voice settings overriding stored setttings for the given voice. They are applied only on the given TTS request.

text.description: The text that will get converted into speech. Currently only English text is supported.

voice_settings.description: Voice settings overriding stored setttings for the given voice. They are applied only on the given TTS request.

tags.name: voices
tags.description: Access to voices created either by you or us.

tags.name: samples
tags.description: Access to your samples. A sample is any audio file you attached to a voice. A voice can have one or more samples.

tags.name: history
tags.description: Accesses your history. Your history is a list of all your created audio including its metadata.
